model_details.description: This model is based on the ViLBERT architecture. The image features are obtained using the ResNet backbone and Faster RCNN (region detection).
model_details.paper: [ViLBERT: Pretraining Task-Agnostic Visiolinguistic Representations for Vision-and-Language Tasks](https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:199453025)

intended_use.primary_uses: This model is developed for the AllenNLP demo.

caveats_and_recommendations.caveats_and_recommendations: This model is trained on the original SNLI-VE dataset. [Subsequent work](https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:215415945) has found that an estimated 31% of `neutral` labels in the dataset are incorrect. The `e-SNLI-VE-2.0` dataset contains the re-annotated validation and test sets.
